Compute hierarchical percentile bootstrap confidence interval.

Source: R/interval.R
compute_hierarchical_percentile_ci.Rd

Uses compute_list_vectors_hierarchical_percentile_ci() to compute percentile confidence interval on data that is structured into runs.

Usage

compute_hierarchical_percentile_ci(.input, .column, ...)

Arguments

.input

Data structured into runs.

.column

Column to compute confidence interval for.

...

Parameters to compute_list_vectors_hierarchical_percentile_ci().

Value

Summarized tibble with confidence interval columns.
